message: A dog is the only thing on earth that loves you more than he loves himself. - Josh Billings
Whoever said you can’t buy happiness forgot little puppies. - Gene Hill
Dogs are not our whole life, but they make our lives whole. - Roger Caras
Dogs are like potato chips. You can't have just one.
The better I get to know men, the more I find myself loving dogs. - Charles de Gaulle
A dog teaches a boy fidelity, perseverance, and to turn around three times before lying down. - Robert Benchley
My dog is not spoiled. I’m just well trained.
Happiness is a warm puppy. - Charles M. Schulz
Some of my best leading men have been dogs and horses. - Elizabeth Taylor
The more people I meet, the more I like my dog.
To err is human — to forgive, canine. - Unknown
Dogs have a way of finding the people who need them and filling an emptiness we didn’t ever know we had. - Thom Jones
My fashion philosophy is, if you're not covered in dog hair, your life is empty.
When you have a dog, you never walk alone. - Unknown
If aliens saw us walking our dogs and picking up their poop, who would they think is in charge? - Unknown
Dogs do speak, but only to those who know how to listen. - Orhan Pamuk
Life is too short to just have one dog.
A house is not a home without a dog. - Unknown
The average dog is a nicer person than the average person. - Andy Rooney
The world would be a nicer place if everyone had the ability to love as unconditionally as a dog. - M.K. Clinton
My windows aren’t dirty. That’s my dog’s nose art.
A dog will teach you unconditional love. If you can have that in your life, things won’t be too bad. - Robert Wagner
The road to my heart is paved with paw prints.
The only thing better than a dog is a dog with a slice of pizza.
Love is a four-legged word. - Unknown
A dog's nose print is unique, much like a human's fingerprint.
Did you know dogs have three eyelids? The third lid, called a nictitating membrane, helps protect and lubricate their eyes.
